attributes.action: British soldiers should not be hunted down
attributes.background:
Conflicts where many innocent civilians were killed,
many more would have died if not for our brave service people.
So please stop hunting these brave service people down.
They were serving crown and country

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/220028
